name: logohub
description: An open-source brand logo repository service for front-end developers

scripts.validate:all: node -e "const {readdirSync} = require('fs'); const {LogoValidator} = require('./tools/logo-validator'); const logos = readdirSync('./logos').filter(d => d !== '.DS_Store'); console.log('Validating all logos...'); Promise.all(logos.map(async logo => { const validator = new LogoValidator(); const result = await validator.validateLogo(logo); return {logo, success: result.success}; })).then(results => { const failed = results.filter(r => !r.success); console.log(`\nðŸ“Š Results: ${results.length - failed.length}/${results.length} passed`); if (failed.length > 0) { console.log('âŒ Failed:', failed.map(f => f.logo).join(', ')); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('ðŸŽ‰ All logos validated successfully!'); } });"

author: LogoHub Team
